attributes.action: 25% Pay cut for MPs to prove willingness to tackle the deficit
attributes.additional_details: All MPs should take a 25% reduction in pay and pensions to show the British people just how committed they are to helping with the reduction of the deficit and to prove they are standing with other civil servants who are having their pay and pensions frozen or cut . They should also only receive half of their expenses back as well as another goodwill gesture for the British people.
